eu.trentorise.opendata.semtext

Class Sentence

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.opendata.semtext.Sentence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasMetadata, Span, Serializable

    @Immutable
@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public final class Sentence
extends Object
implements Span, Serializable, HasMetadata
    A sentence which can contain terms.
    Author:
    David Leoni
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getStart

        public int getStart()
        Description copied from interface: Span
        An absolute start offset based on the text of the SemText containing this span. The offset is positioned at the first character of the span, so for span getStart would be 0. 
         I see
 012345
        In the special case of empty span, getStart and getEnd must concide.
        Specified by:
        getStart in interface Span

      • getEnd

        public int getEnd()
        Description copied from interface: Span
        An absolute getEnd offset based on the text of the SemText containing this span. The offset is positioned *after* the last character of the sentence, so for span 
         I see
 012345
        getEnd would be 5. In the special case of empty span, getStart and getEnd must concide.
        Specified by:
        getEnd in interface Span

      • of

        public static Sentence of(int start,
          int end,
          Term... terms)
        Creates a sentence with the given terms.
        Parameters:
        start - 0-indexed span offset start. Position is absolute with respect to the text stored in the SemText container.
        end - the position of the character immediately *after* the sentence itself. Position is absolute with respect to the text stored in the SemText container.
        terms - the terms within the sentence.

      • of

        public static Sentence of(int start,
          int end,
          Iterable<Term> terms)
        Creates a sentence.
        Parameters:
        start - 0-indexed span offset start. Position is absolute with respect to the text stored in the SemText container.
        end - the position of the character immediately *after* the sentence itself. Position is absolute with respect to the text stored in the SemText container.
        terms - Terms within the sentence.

      • of

        public static Sentence of(int start,
          int end,
          Iterable<Term> terms,
          Map<String,?> metadata)
        Creates a sentence.
        Parameters:
        start - 0-indexed span offset start. Position is absolute with respect to the text stored in the SemText container.
        end - the position of the character immediately *after* the sentence itself. Position is absolute with respect to the text stored in the SemText container.
        terms - Terms within the sentence.
        metadata - a map of metadata. Provided metadata objects must be immutable.

      • of

        public static Sentence of(int start,
          int end)
        Creates a sentence of zero terms.
        Parameters:
        start - 0-indexed span offset start. Position is absolute with respect to the text stored in the SemText container.
        end - the position of the character immediately *after* the sentence itself. Position is absolute with respect to the text stored in the SemText container.

      • withMetadata

        public Sentence withMetadata(String namespace,
                    Object metadata)
        Returns a copy of this object with the provided metadata set under the given namespace.
        Parameters:
        metadata - Must be an immutable object.

      • withTerms

        public Sentence withTerms(Iterable<Term> terms)
        Returns a copy of this object with the provided terms set. New terms will replace all the existing ones.

      • withTerms

        public Sentence withTerms(Term... terms)
        Returns a copy of this object with the provided terms set. New terms will replace all the existing ones.
